section.title: Allergies and Intolerances (Reaction List) [with entries]
section.text: 1. Food intolerance to Lactose from birth documented April 12, 2012; onset March 2012. Confirmed mild abdominal pain. 4. Drug intolerance to Amoxicillin 250mg/5mL s/f oral suspension (Penicillin); documented May 10, 2012; onset May 8 2012. Confirmed moderate Hives presented at clinic.

observation.text: Abdominal pain after feeding reported by mother.

section.title: Developmental Measured Observations [with entries]
section.text: Birth weight 17 Jan 2012 2.8 kg Infant APGAR score 17 Jan 2012 5/7/9 Head Circumference 17 Jan 2012 31 cm Height 17 Jan 2012 46 cm

code.displayName: History of hospitalizations+History of outpatient visits

list.item:
1. 17 April 2012 10 am -10.30 am Office Dr. Andre de Wit 3 month well baby check 3 month well baby check. Mom missed 6 week check. Hx: SVD 39 wks. Known alcohol exposure during pregnancy. Head circumference <95th percentile at birth. Breast fed. No vaccination yet. Single mom. Milestones: No smiling, no grasping. Responds to sound/localizing. Head flexion up 45 degrees. Hypotonic. Irritable. Microcephalic. Chestclear. Hearsounds normal. No murmurs. Responding to sound. Abdomen soft. ENT-NAD. Dx FAS Plan:Refer early childhood development program DTp vaccination today. MCFS will be contacted.
Denver developmental chart:

2. 15 Dec 2012 Office Dr. Andre de Wit Cough and fever 3 days cough and fever. Not eating well. No vomiting or diarrhea. Formula fed but taking baby food as well. O/E Lethargic baby. Temp 39 degrees C. Not dehydrated. Resp rate 18. Some wheeze ut no indrawing. Crusty nose. Both Tm’s red and bulging. Pharynx red. No pus. Neck supple. Crusty eyes. Ongoing microcephaly. Weight: 5.2 kg Head circ: 42. cm Dx Influenza BOM Bronchiolitis Rx Biaxin Tylenol Ventolin with aerochamber. Advise mom to see public health for next vaccination.
Percentile Chart:

observation.value:

Dx FAS
